page.title: 11TOURISM
page.content: Dornoch is a popular resort with many tourists from this country and abroad. Many visitors come by car or coach as part of a touring holiday during the summer. The main attractions are the golf courses and sandy beach. Visitors also enjoy walking round the cathedral square. The old Town Jail is now a craft centre with a good selection of Scottish crafts. Dornoch has two big hotels overlooking the golf course. There are several smaller hotels and many guest houses. Hotel prices range from Â£170 to Â£240 per week. Guest houses may charge Â£8_Â£12 per night. For those who prefer self_catering, there are chalets, cottages and some caravans. Dornoch has a large camping and caravan site close to the beach. Dornoch has a Tourist Office which has local information and helps visitors to find accommodation all year round.
